price: 56 Je n’ai créé les djinns et les hommes que pour qu’ils M’adorent.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
